hopobject.name: support

hopobject.body:
Support Resources

Please execute the board diagnostics, review the hardware documentation, and consult the mailing list and IRC channel for support. The Beagle Board is a "community" project with support only given to those who are willing to discussing their issues openly for the benefit of the entire community.

  • Board Diagnostics
  • Hardware Reference Materials
  • Mailing List and IRC Channel
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Repairs

Repairs and replacements only provided on unmodified boards purchased via Digi-Key within the first 90 days. All repaired board will have their flash reset to factory contents. For repairs and replacements, please contact 'support' at beagleboard.org using the RMA form:

  • Register board
  • RMA request
